instructions: From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Scroll to 'Personal,' then tap Accounts . Tap + Add account . Select the account type you wish to setup. Enter your email address and password. Edit incoming email configuration settings, as necessary. Tap Next . Edit outgoing email configuration settings, as necessary. Tap Next . Read the Google disclaimer and tap OK to accept. Set the email check frequency, retrieval size, and notification options, as desired. Tap Next . Enter an account name (optional). Tap Done .
From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Scroll to 'Personal,' then tap Accounts . Tap the account you wish to remove. Tap the MORE icon. Tap Remove account . Tap DELETE to confirm.
